title: Python Programming Instructional Design Scenarios for Earth Science Data Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistical knowledge and understanding of fundamental earth science concepts
context.additional_context: Python programming course for pre-service/in-service teachers to strengthen earth science data analysis competencies

learning_goals: Learners can utilize Python fundamentals and core libraries (pandas, matplotlib, etc.) for earth science data analysis
Learners can enhance problem-solving abilities through discussion and collaborative activities based on pre-learned content using a flipped learning approach
Apply a constructivist approach to analyze real-world Earth science data and interpret visualization results
Design and implement individual research projects to strengthen self-directed learning competencies
Experience peer assessment and feedback processes through active learning strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
